warscrolls.name: Aetherwings
warscrolls.fluff: Said to be swifter than the winds themselves, Aetherwings are often found racing across the skies in shimmering flocks or circling above their Vanguard allies, descending upon any who would menace the Stormcasts in a flurry of razor‑sharp talons.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Marked for Destruction
abilities.lore: Those who oppose the masters of these loyal beasts hear doom approaching in the beating of celestial wings.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for shooting attacks made by friendly **VANGUARD CHAMBER** units if the target is within 9" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Annihilators
warscrolls.fluff: Wielding hammers and shields hewn from enchanted meteoric rock, Annihilators are sometimes held to be unkillable. They do not descend from the heavens but emerge horizontally through rifts of crackling lightning, and their brutal momentum is a weapon in itself.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Brace for Impact
abilities.lore: Annihilators brace behind their mighty shields to hold off even the most ferocious charge.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that charged this turn and is in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in this unit. If any of the rolls are a 6, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Blazing Impact
abilities.lore: Annihilators arrive upon the field with devastating force, twin tailed trails streaking behind them as an earth-shattering shock-wave blasts apart the foes of Sigmar.
abilities.declare: If this unit was set up this turn using the ‘Scions of the Storm’ ability, pick up to 3 enemy units within 10" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Annihilators with Meteoric Grandhammers
warscrolls.fluff: Only the Annihilators have the physique necessary to wield the meteoric grandhammer, a huge maul inset with a meteor fragment torn from the very firmament by the Six Smiths. Though the warriors’ advance is slow, it only takes them one well-placed blow to crush an adversary utterly.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Force of a Falling Star
abilities.lore: As Annihilators build up momentum, their charge carries the same force as the impact of their arrival.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase and the unmodified charge roll was 8+, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Blazing Impact
abilities.lore: Annihilators arrive upon the field with devastating force, twin tailed trails streaking behind them as an earth-shattering shock-wave blasts apart the foes of Sigmar.
abilities.declare: If this unit was set up this turn using the ‘Scions of the Storm’ ability, pick up to 3 enemy units within 10" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Astreia Solbright
warscrolls.fluff: Lord-Arcanum Solbright of the Shimmersouls chamber wields the magics of the storm with remarkable proficiency. Mounted atop the Dracoline Kazra, she crackles with static charge, blasting enemies to cinders while leaving her allies unscathed.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Thunderous Pounce
abilities.lore: After years of commanding Dracolines, Astreia’s orders can send an entire pack sprinting into battle without hesitation, her own mount Kazra leading the charge.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to charge rolls for friendly **SACROSANCT CHAMBER CAVALRY** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Lightning Pulse
abilities.lore: With electricity pulsing from her eyes, Astreia gathers the power of Azyr into herself and then releases it as a blinding, expanding dome of lightning.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with this unit to be the targets, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If you picked 1 unit, inflict 3 mortal damage on the target. If you picked 2 units, inflict 2 mortal damage on each target. If you picked 3 units, inflict 1 mortal damage on each target.

abilities.name: Soul Energy of the First Host
abilities.lore: Astreia Solbright can enhance the soul energy of nearby Sacrosanct warriors, allowing them to perform extraordinary deeds.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **SACROSANCT CHAMBER** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Aventis Firestrike, Magister of Hammerhal
warscrolls.fluff: Aventis Firestrike, Magister of Hammerhal, is a mage with a heart of flame. In battle, he is a formidable force, channelling the energies of Azyr and Aqshy both as he soars atop the Tauralon Loithar.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Thunderhead Crown
abilities.lore: Aventis’s helm taps into the Anvil of Apotheosis, renewing him even in the thick of battle.
abilities.effect: **Heal (3)** this unit.

abilities.name: Pyroelectric Blast
abilities.lore: By combining the magic of Aqshy and Azyr, Aventis can channel a blast of power that can melt even solid stone.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict 3 mortal damage on the target, then inflict 1 mortal damage on each other enemy unit within 3" of the target.

abilities.name: Comet Trail
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The flight of a Tauralon is accompanied by sparkling Azyrite energies that serve as a beacon to keen-eyed Sigmarite warriors.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the phase, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks that target that enemy unit.

warscrolls.name: Castigators
warscrolls.fluff: When beings born out of the aether rear their heads, it is the Castigators who put them down. Channelling celestial powers through their thunderhead greatbows, they provide covering fire to their kindred, projectiles detonating with blazing force.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Castigator Aetheric Channelling
abilities.lore: Castigators can use their knowledge of the arcane to channel aetheric energy, making their weapons more accurate.
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a **MOVE** ability this turn and was not set up this turn, this unit’s shooting attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+ for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Scouting Companion
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a SHOOT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: A Castigator’s Gryph-hound can be sent out into the fray to identify the enemy’s weak points.
abilities.effect: Until the **SHOOT** ability is resolved, add 3" to the Range characteristic of this unit’s **Thunderhead Greatbows** and add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks. Remove this unit’s **Gryph-hound** from the battlefield after the **SHOOT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Dependable Gryph-hound
abilities.lore: Some Castigators are accompanied by Gryph-hounds trained to aid them in battle.
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Gryph-hound** is a token. If this unit’s **Gryph-hound** has been removed, it cannot use the ‘Scouting Companion’ ability.

warscrolls.name: Celestant-Prime, Hammer of Sigmar
warscrolls.fluff: The Celestant-Prime serves as Sigmar’s hand. Armed with Ghal Maraz and the Cometstrike Sceptre, a celestial relic capable of snatching meteors from the firmament and hurling them to the battlefield, few can stand before him. When unleashed, the Celestant-Prime is a force of vengeance and redemption alike, guided on his holy mission by a swirling cosmic orrery that offers glimpses of future paths.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Infantry, Fly, Ward (5+), Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Retribution From On High
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: The Celestant-Prime descends from Azyr into the thickest fighting, Ghal Maraz glowing with power as it smites the foe.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit if it is **in the Celestial Realm**.
abilities.effect: Subtract the current battle round number from 10 to determine this unit’s strike zone. Set up this unit on the battlefield more than a number of inches equal to its strike zone from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Cometstrike Sceptre
abilities.lore: Blazing with celestial might, the Celestant-Prime raises his sceptre high before letting it fall, causing comets to rain from above.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit attacks with its **Cometstrike Sceptre**, if the attack scores a hit, inflict D3 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.name: Celestar Ballista
warscrolls.fluff: Mobile artillery of the Ordinatos conclaves, Celestar Ballistas are weapons of terrible power. Their Sacristan operators are skilled combat engineers, and the sigmarite bolts these weapons spit forth explode with the force of the thunderbolt.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Stormbolt Tempest
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Should a foe charge their position, Sacristan Engineers can loose a quick-fire volley at close range.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit and that charged this turn to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Celestian Vortex
warscrolls.fluff: A Celestian Vortex is a whirling tornado of Azyrite magic within which swirl a host of spinning arcane hammers. Any caught in the path of this bludgeoning cyclone are swiftly shattered into oblivion.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Tornado of Magic
abilities.lore: The tempestuous air currents that swirl around a Celestian Vortex disrupt the aim of the enemy's ranged troops and the flight of the missiles they loose.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks made by enemy units while they are within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

warscrolls.name: Dais Arcanum
warscrolls.fluff: A Dais Arcanum is a machine-like conjuration capable of repelling a realmsphere’s gravity and travelling through the air at great speed. Its innate magic is attuned to the soul of the warrior who rides upon it: with a thought they can bid the Dais to glide out of the way of an oncoming attack or draw power from its gleaming wake to augment their spellcraft.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Arcane Enhancement
abilities.lore: A Stormcast blessed to be borne upon a Dais Arcanum feels the celestial energies of Azyr course through them.
abilities.effect:
While the unit that was picked to be the target of the 'Summon Dais Arcanum' ability is on the platform of this **MANIFESTATION**:

• That unit has **WARD (5+)** and **FLY**.
• If that unit is a **WIZARD**, add 1 to that unit's power level.
• That unit cannot use **MOVE** abilities and remains on this **MANIFESTATION** each time it moves.
• Instead of measuring range or visibility to and from that unit, measure to and from this **MANIFESTATION** instead.
• This **MANIFESTATION** cannot be picked to be the target of abilities other than **BANISH** abilities.
• If that unit is picked to make a pile-in move, move this **MANIFESTATION** instead.

If this **MANIFESTATION** is banished, before removing it from the battlefield, set up the unit on its platform on the battlefield within 3" of it. That unit can only be set up in combat with units it was already in combat with when this **MANIFESTATION** was banished. If it is not possible to set up that unit, it is destroyed.

If the unit on the platform is removed from the battlefield, immediately remove this **MANIFESTATION** from play.

warscrolls.name: Decimators
warscrolls.fluff: The advance of the Decimators is marked by piles of butchered corpses. These Paladins are remorseless in eradicating Sigmar’s enemies and, armed with their brutal thunderaxes, never tire when cleaving through hordes of the hateful foe.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Decimating Blow
abilities.lore: A single swing of a thunderaxe can carve through several foes.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Decimator Thunderaxes** if the target unit has 10 or more models.

warscrolls.name: Domitan’s Stormcoven
warscrolls.fluff: Domitan’s Stormcoven, war-mages of the mysterious Valedictor Temple, are surrounded by a strange aura of aetheric lightning-energy. Though the nature of this power evades even their study, the trio nevertheless excel in harnessing it through waves of crackling magic.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Aethershock
abilities.lore: The Stormcoven unleash their stored energies across the battlefield, bolstering their allies or blasting enemies to the ground.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible unit within 12" of the caster to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the target is a friendly unit, it has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn. If the target is an enemy unit, it has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Gather the Aether
abilities.lore: A Stormcoven can harness the aetheric energies from the ley lines that criss-cross the Mortal Realms, ready to be unleashed at a moment’s notice.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to this unit’s power level while it is contesting an objective.

warscrolls.name: Dracothian Guard Concussors
warscrolls.fluff: Thunder cracks with every weighty blow delivered by the Concussors. Those foes not slain outright by bludgeoning strikes are battered into submission, stunned by the azure shockwaves released by those resounding impacts.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Thunderstruck
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: When a lightning hammer finds its mark, enemies are paralysed by crackling energy and a flash of blinding light.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Dracothian Guard Concussors (1 model)
warscrolls.fluff: Thunder cracks with every weighty blow delivered by the Concussors. Those foes not slain outright by bludgeoning strikes are battered into submission, stunned by the azure shockwaves released by those resounding impacts.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Dracothian Guard Desolators
warscrolls.fluff: Those of the Desolator retinues swing biting greataxes capable of cleaning through multiple enemy footsoldiers at once. These bleak executioners are revered by their kin and feared by the God-King's enemies in equal measure for their sheer power and uncompromising drive.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Cleaving Blow
abilities.lore: A single swing of a thunderaxe can carve through several foes.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Thunderaxes** if the target unit has 10 or more models.

abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Dracothian Guard Fulminators
warscrolls.fluff: Aggressive and bold, there is no foe the Fulminators dare not charge. A surge of celestial energy builds before the ground-shaking impetus of their onset, a crackling war-cloud that travels like a bow wave before their lowered stormstrike glaives.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Impaling Strikes
abilities.lore: On the charge, the blade of a stormstrike glaive can impale several foes.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Dracothian Guard Tempestors
warscrolls.fluff: While their Dracoths charge forward spitting lightning, the Tempestors unleash the fury of their volleystorm crossbows, loosing a hail of bolts that burn like blazing meteorites. They can concentrate their fire to fell powerful foes or blast holes in enemy lines for other Dracothian Guard to exploit.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Volleystorm
abilities.lore: The Tempestors fire charged crossbow bolts into the foe, weakening their defences and leaving them open to a follow-up assault.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit’s **Volleystorm Crossbows** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target cannot use the ‘All-out Defence’ command in the following combat phase.

warscrolls.name: Dracothian Guard Tempestors (1 model)
warscrolls.fluff: While their Dracoths charge forward spitting lightning, the Tempestors unleash the fury of their volleystorm crossbows, loosing a hail of bolts that burn like blazing meteorites. They can concentrate their fire to fell powerful foes or blast holes in enemy lines for other Dracothian Guard to exploit.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Overwhelming Volleystorm
abilities.lore: The Tempestors fire charged crossbow bolts into the foe, weakening their defences and leaving them open to a follow-up assault.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit’s **Volleystorm Crossbows** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, the target cannot use the ‘All-out Defence’ command in the following combat phase.

warscrolls.name: Drakesworn Templar
warscrolls.fluff: When they are not manning the Drakesworn Temples of their Stormhost, the Drakesworn Templars fight as martial champions alongside their Lord‑Celestant. Such is their skill and the cosmic might of their mounts that they are able to overwhelm entire sections of the enemy’s battleline on their own, the Stardrakes incinerating foes with cascades of fire and lightning even as their riders send forth celestial blasts from their skybolt bows.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Stardrake’s Cavernous Jaws** is 4.

abilities.name: Monstrous Challenge
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Though not strictly holding the rank of knight, the Drakesworn Templars fulfil a similar role within the Extremis chambers, charging off to face the greatest threats in single combat.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy **MONSTER** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+, for the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Stardrake’s Cavernous Jaws** for attacks that target that enemy **MONSTER**.
• If that enemy **MONSTER** is also a **HERO**, add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Templar Weapon** for attacks that target that unit.

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Everblaze Comet
warscrolls.fluff: Everblaze Comets are nothing less than meteors plucked from the firmament and sent hurtling to the battlefield. They are an awe-inspiring sight to the followers of Sigmar, for they evoke the myth of his arrival in the Mortal Realms, borne through the void upon the core of the World-that-Was.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Manifestation, Endless Spell, Ward (6+), Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Burning Vengeance
abilities.lore: An Everblaze Comet smashes into the battlefield with tremendous force, its glowing remnants radiating a corona of deadly Azyrite energies.
abilities.declare: If this **MANIFESTATION** was summoned this phase, pick any number of enemy units within 6" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Arcane Disruption
abilities.lore: The emanations from an Everblaze Comet disrupt the magical abilities of nearby wizards.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy **WIZARDS** while they are within 12" of this **MANIFESTATION**.

warscrolls.name: Evocators
warscrolls.fluff: Armed with sword and stave, Evocators are masterful warriors. Their true strength, however, lies in harnessing Azyr’s mystical energies to infuse their allies with tempestuous strength.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Empower
abilities.lore: Evocators can draw magic from the sky itself, charging those around them with Azyr’s fulminating lightning and empowering weapons with thunderous energy.
abilities.declare: If this unit is contesting an objective you control, pick a visible friendly non-**HERO STORMCAST ETERNALS INFANTRY** unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Warrior Mages
abilities.lore: Evocators are masters of the martial and the arcane.
abilities.effect: This unit can use **UNBIND** abilities as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Evocators on Celestial Dracolines
warscrolls.fluff: Dracolines are fearsome beasts of Azyr whose roars can unman even the staunchest foes. When their savagery is allied with the magical prowess of an Evocator, the result is a force to be reckoned with.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Dracoline Fury
abilities.lore: Predators by nature, Dracolines prefer to roam and hunt rather than be held back in defence, ferociously tearing into those marked as prey.
abilities.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective you do not control, it has **STRIKE-FIRST**.

abilities.name: Warrior Mages
abilities.lore: Evocators are masters of the martial and the arcane.
abilities.effect: This unit can use **UNBIND** abilities as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Gardus Steel Soul
warscrolls.fluff: Lord-Celestant Gardus is revered by many mortals as a warrior-saint, and since his second Reforging, a halo of gleaming light has surrounded him. His warriors believe this to be the purity of their Lord‑Celestant’s spirit made manifest, and they would follow him into the mouth of ruin itself if he so required.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Aura of Purity
abilities.lore: Gardus’s faith is so strong when he is in full flow that even Nurgle’s garden was unable to corrupt him.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units have **WARD (5+)** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Saintly Assault
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase
abilities.lore: Calling upon the celestial grace of Sigmar, the lords of the Steel Souls engage the foe with zealous wrath.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS INFANTRY** units wholly within 6" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:
• Add 1 to charge rolls for the targets.
• Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ melee weapons.

warscrolls.name: Gavriel Sureheart
warscrolls.fluff: Gavriel Sureheart is an unstoppable force of righteousness and liberation. The Lord-Celestant is only satisfied when on the attack, relentlessly leading from the front and cutting down his foes in a whirlwind of blows.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Once More, for Sigmar, Charge!
abilities.lore: Gavriel’s unshakeable devotion to Sigmar sees his warriors charging straight into the front lines, no matter the dangers before them.
abilities.declare: Pick this unit and another visible friendly **WARRIOR CHAMBER** unit within 3" of it to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the phase, when making charge rolls for the targets, add 1 to the number of dice rolled, then remove 1 dice of your choice and use the remaining dice as the charge roll.

abilities.name: Sigmarite Thundershield
abilities.lore: When struck with sufficient force, thundershields unleash stored storm energy to blast those attempting to attack.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Gryph-hounds
warscrolls.fluff: Gryph-hounds have senses as sharp as their retractable claws and heavy, hooked beaks. These nimble quadrupeds are possessed of a noble disposition and an innate hatred of Chaos, and they will ferociously attack on sight anyone or anything tainted by the Dark Gods.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Beast, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Beast
abilities.effect: This unit has a maximum control score of 1.

abilities.name: Warning Cry
abilities.lore: It is said that it is impossible to sneak up on a Gryph-hound.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit that was set up this turn. Then, pick up to 3 friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units armed with ranged weapons that are within 12" of that enemy unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Ionus Cryptborn, Warden of Lost Souls
warscrolls.fluff: After several lifetimes in Sigmar’s service, Ionus has been called by the God-King to a higher purpose. He serves as his champion across every realm, reinforcing Stormhosts that have been repeatedly ground down and helping to guide their diminishing souls back towards the path of light. However, once a protracted campaign is finally shepherded to its end, he gathers up those Stormcasts barely clinging to their humanity and leads them to the Bleak Citadels of the Ruination chambers.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Priest (2), Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of **Cthorak’s Ancient Claws** is 4.

abilities.name: Lightning Tempest
abilities.lore: Ionus calls upon Sigmar to unleash the wrath of Azyr.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be struck by lightning, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit, then roll a dice. On a 1-2, the sequence ends. On a 3+, pick another enemy unit within 3" of that unit to be struck by lightning and inflict D3 mortal damage on it. If the chanting roll was 10+, you can pick another enemy unit within 6" of that unit instead of 3". Keep rolling dice in this way until the sequence ends or there are no other enemy units eligible to be struck by lightning. A unit cannot be struck by lightning more than once per turn.

abilities.name: Soulburned
abilities.lore: Once an enemy has been burnt by Cthorak’s scouring flames, their soul ignites deep within their body.
abilities.declare: This unit can use this ability even if it has been destroyed. Pick any number of **SOULBURNED** enemy units to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Spirit-scouring Flames
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: Enemies engulfed by Cthorak’s pale-flame breath feel their very souls begin to burn away.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit’s **Spirit‑scouring Flames** to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target has the **SOULBURNED** keyword for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-**CORE** ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

warscrolls.name: Iridan the Witness
warscrolls.fluff: Iridan the Witness is determined to preserve the memory of the Ruination chambers’ warriors as they once were, before the nightmare of the flaw and the slow degradation of their souls. Through the power of remembrance and the shattering power of their martial might, the Witness will fight for those who have sacrificed everything in the name of the God-King. Accompanying them on this sombre journey is the mighty Morrgryph Ariax, a deadly beast who bears the favour of the Bleak Raven.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Priest (1), Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Prayer of the Witness
abilities.lore: Iridan serves as a beacon of light that guides the souls of those in the Ruination chambers, giving their actions purpose and calming the storm that churns within each of them.
abilities.declare: Make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn, each time a friendly **RUINATION CHAMBER** unit uses a **FIGHT** ability while it is wholly within 18" of this unit, after that ability has been resolved:

• **Heal (D3)** that unit. If the chanting roll was 8+, **Heal (3)** that unit instead.
• That unit has **WARD (6+)** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-Core ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Dark Flight
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: A hapless foe is crushed in the talons of Ariax before the Morrgryph takes flight once more with a beat of their ebon wings.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. If the roll exceeds the target’s Health characteristic:

• 1 model in the target unit is slain.
• This unit can immediately use the ‘Retreat’ ability without any mortal damage being inflicted upon it.

warscrolls.name: Judicators with Boltstorm Crossbows
warscrolls.fluff: Judicators who wield boltstorm crossbows are adept in the culling of enemy hordes. These rapid-firing weapons launch ammunition tipped with blessed sigmarite; by the time these strike home, they are thoroughly enveloped in coruscating storm-energies.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Hail of Bolts
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: After shooting, the area around a Judicator’s target is riddled with stray bolts and corpses, creating obstacles for the enemy.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **INFANTRY** unit that does not have **FLY** and that had any models slain this phase by this unit’s shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, until the start of your next turn, subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.

warscrolls.name: Judicators with Skybolt Bows
warscrolls.fluff: No foe can escape the keen gaze of the Judicators. Granted the ability to sense corruption, the storm of arrow fire unleashed by their skybolt bows fells ranks of enemies with relentless and merciless precision.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Subduing Shots
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: With eagle-eyed aim, Judicators can hit enemy beasts exactly where it hurts the most.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **MONSTER** that had any damage points allocated to it this phase by this unit’s shooting attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use **RAMPAGE** abilities until the start of your next turn.

warscrolls.name: Karazai the Scarred
warscrolls.fluff: Karazai does not so much lead Azyrite armies as simply arrive on the eve of battle. None would ever turn him away, though his draconic kin often find themselves unnerved by his spectacular shows of violence. He is capable of taking on entire enemy detachments alone, attacking without discrimination with jets of flame, cavernous jaws and great lashing tail alike.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Ancient Master of War
abilities.lore: Karazai has seen countless battles over the heady span of his life, and the reptilian fury he displays can overpower any foe.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Calamitous Tail Sweep
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: With a sweep of his tail, Karazai can lay waste to enemy formations.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 5+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Fires of Retribution
abilities.lore: Vengeance burns blinding and everlasting in Karazai’s soul.
abilities.effect:
While this unit has 5-9 damage points, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons. 

While this unit has 10 or more damage points, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons instead.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Arcanum
warscrolls.fluff: A Knight-Arcanum is an arcane warrior privy to secrets beyond the ken of their martial-minded comrades. Their consciousness expanded by the Hyshian gemstones embedded in their wargear, the Knight-Arcanums unleash storms of celestial fury upon their foes, slamming them with stunning cosmic winds or deadly hails of razor-sharp ice.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Indomitable Loreseekers
abilities.lore: The thick tomes carried by Knight-Arcanums are filled with the magical secrets they have learnt, including how to resist the raging sorcerous energies of the realms.
abilities.effect:
Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit when it uses a **SUMMON** ability and add 1 to banishment rolls for this unit.

Enemy **MANIFESTATIONS** cannot pass through or end any move within this unit’s combat range unless they started that move within this unit’s combat range.

This unit has **WARD (4+)** against mortal damage inflicted by **MANIFESTATIONS**.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Azyros
warscrolls.fluff: A winged herald borne aloft on wings of flame, the Knight-Azyros is a symbol of hope and faith to the followers of Sigmar. Each carries a sacred lantern the light from which guides and heals the righteous even as it sears the eyes of Sigmar's enemies.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Light in the Dark
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
abilities.lore: This warrior's celestial beacon serves as a guiding light to their fellow Prosecutors.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Prosecutors** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects:

• If the target is in combat, the target can immediately use the 'Retreat' ability as if it were your movement phase without any mortal damage being inflicted on it.
• If the target is not in combat, the target can immediately use the 'Normal Move' ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: The Light of Sigmar
abilities.lore: With its shutters closed, the lantern of a Knight-Azyros soothes nearby allies. Opening it wide blinds the enemy with the full majesty of Sigmar's light.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects:

• For the rest of the turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.
• **Heal (D3)** each friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit within this unit's combat range.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Draconis
warscrolls.fluff: Only one who has truly bonded with a Draconith can become a Knight-Draconis. Such unity is symbolised by the flaming blades these champions wield, and they eagerly bring burning death to any foe that stands before them.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Wrath of the Draconith
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: At their champion's command, the Stormdrake Guard bring to bear the full power of their mounts when the foe least expects it.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly **Stormdrake Guard** unit within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of both this unit’s and the target’s **Draconith’s Fangs and Talons** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Arcane Heritage
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability
abilities.lore: Some exceptional Draconith are able to awaken their kind's innate resistance to magic within their broodmates.
abilities.effect: If this unit or a friendly **Stormdrake Guard** unit wholly within 12" of this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 4+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit or that friendly unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per **SPELL** ability.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Heraldor
warscrolls.fluff: Thunderous notes resounding from their enchanted battle-horn, a Knight-Heraldor is an immovable beacon of defiance. So powerful are the clarion blasts they unleash that the resulting shockwave can topple buildings, uproot trees and shatter monoliths.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Call to Battle
abilities.lore: The enchanted battle horn of the Knight-Heraldor can be heard in distant Azyr, summoning reinforcements from the storm itself.
abilities.effect: If a friendly **WARRIOR CHAMBER** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

abilities.name: Thunderblast
abilities.lore: The strident peal of a battlehorn can summon a localised tempest above an enemy structure, hammering it with repeated lightning strikes and fist-sized hailstones.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible faction terrain feature within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Incantor
warscrolls.fluff: The Knight-Incantors are veteran mages of the Sacrosanct chambers. With their powerful voices, they summon furious tempests and howling gales to unleash against the foe, wielding potent artefacts to nullify enemy sorceries.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Voidstorm Scroll
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability for a WIZARD within 30" of this unit
abilities.lore: Each Knight-Incantor bears a scroll infused with potent void magic.
abilities.effect: The spell is unbound and its effect is not resolved.

abilities.name: Aetheric Destabilisation
abilities.lore: Expert summoners all, Knight-Incantors can detect and disable similar spells cast by their enemies.
abilities.effect: While they are within 30" of this unit, subtract 1 from casting rolls for enemy units when they use **SUMMON** abilities.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Judicator with Gryph-hounds
warscrolls.fluff: Officers of the Justicar conclaves, the Knight-Judicators are more akin to living artillery pieces than marksmen. One of these Stormcasts typically looses the opening shot of battle, pulling back the string of their colossal terminus greatbow before releasing an arrow that unerringly finds its mark.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Hunting Hounds
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: The Knight-Judicator sends one of their Gryph-hounds to harass an enemy unit.
abilities.declare: If this unit was not set up this turn and any of this unit’s **Gryph‑hounds** are on the battlefield, pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 1, remove 1 of this unit’s **Gryph-hounds** from the battlefield. On a 2+, pick 1 of this unit’s **Gryph-hounds** that is next to this unit or next to an enemy unit and place it next to the target instead.

While any of this unit’s **Gryph-hounds** are next to an enemy unit, add 1 to hit rolls and wound rolls for this unit’s shooting attacks that target that unit.

If an enemy unit is destroyed or removed from the battlefield while any of this unit’s **Gryph-hounds** are next to it, place those **Gryph-hounds** next to this unit.

abilities.name: Faithful Gryph-hounds
abilities.lore: A Knight-Judicator is often accompanied into battle by a pair of these loyal beasts of Azyr.
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Gryph-hounds** are tokens. After setting up this unit on the battlefield for the first time, place both **Gryph-hounds** next to it.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Questor
warscrolls.fluff: Standing apart from their fellow officers, the Knight-Questors are unburdened by the pressures of command; rather, these errant heroes possess more singular burdens. Each has been chosen by the God-King for a mission of the utmost import, and they will go to any lengths to see it done.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: His Will Be Done
abilities.lore: Questors will stop at nothing to fulfil the sacred task given to them by the God-King himself.
abilities.effect:
While this unit is contesting a questmarked objective:

• Add 3 to this unit’s control score.
• This unit has **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Heroic Retribution
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Should the need arise, the Knight-Questor will call upon their Soulsworn brethren to make the God-King’s justice a reality.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **Questor Soulsworn** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

abilities.name: Ordained Quest
abilities.lore: Questors travel deep into enemy territory to gain control of vital landmarks with hidden secrets.
abilities.effect: Pick an objective wholly outside friendly territory. That objective is considered by you to be questmarked.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Relictor
warscrolls.fluff: As they chant dolorous lays of retribution, a Knight-Relictor will burn the bones of saints and martyrs in their skull-faced censer. The incense released from this sacrifice is imbued with warding magic that swallows heretical powers and protects their fellow Stormcasts from the imprecations of dark deities.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Relic Censer
abilities.lore: The censers of the Relictor temple emanate purifying incense that can burn through the very fabric of heretical falsehoods and mystical hexes.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 2+, subtract 1 from ward rolls made by the target for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Venator
warscrolls.fluff: Not even the mightiest adversaries can escape the vengeance of a Knight-Venator. Accompanied by their faithful Star-eagles, these winged hunters prowl the skies with incredible swiftness, loosing blessed arrows that unerringly seek their targets.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Star-fated Arrow
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: Whispering the name of a powerful foe, the Knight-Venator looses an arrow destined to end that enemy’s life.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 24" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: If the target is a non-**MONSTER** unit, inflict D6 mortal damage on it. If the target is a **MONSTER**, inflict D6+3 mortal damage on it.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Vexillor
warscrolls.fluff: Only the Knight-Vexillors are entrusted with the sacred standards of Azyr. Those known as Banners of Apotheosis are imbued with energies drawn from the great artefact upon which the Stormcast Eternals are remade; when such a standard is planted near to them, they are invigorated by the magic of the heavens.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: The Banner of the Reforged
abilities.lore: When the Knight-Vexillor plants their banner, the fortifying energy that emanates from it hardens flesh and seals sundered armour, empowering the faithful with new resolve.
abilities.declare: Pick up to D3 friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units wholly within 12" of this unit to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to each target’s control score for the rest of the turn. In addition, **Heal (D3)** each target.

warscrolls.name: Knight-Zephyros
warscrolls.fluff: A Knight-Zephyros serves as one of Sigmar’s assassins. Once a target is marked, they employ their god-wrought blessings to travel the winds aetheric and run down their prey, eventually overcoming them in a flurry of lightning-swift violence.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber

abilities.name: Tireless Hunter
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: This determined warrior never stops moving in pursuit of their prey.
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: This unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Krondys, Son of Dracothion
warscrolls.fluff: Few beings can claim to be as ancient as Krondys. Once ruler of the Draconith empire and now father to a broken race, Krondys is a relic of a time before the gods walked. Aeons ago, he presided over an empire of sorcerer-drakes that spanned much of Ghur. When Kragnos, scion of the equally ancient Drogrukh race, waged war against the Draconith, Krondys was there. It was he who brokered a deal with the Seraphon, seeking their aid in protecting the last eggs of his people in return for helping to stop Kragnos.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Monster, Wizard (2), Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Apex Maw** is 2.

abilities.name: Atavistic Tempest
abilities.lore: Wielding the power of Azyr alongside the lost magics of the Draconith empire, Krondys barrages the enemy with elemental storms.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of the caster to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect:
Pick 1 of the following effects to apply to the target until the start of your next turn:

***Blinding Gales:*** Subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks.

***Meteor-hail:*** Subtract 1 from the Rend characteristic of the target’s weapons.

***Flash-freezing Blizzard:*** Subtract 1 from save rolls for the target.

abilities.name: Soul-shaking Roar
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Defiant in the face of any foe, Krondys issues an ear shattering roar at those who dare face him.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, the target cannot use commands for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Regalia Fulmentarus
abilities.lore: A symbol of the Draconith–Stormcast alliance, this mastersmithed mantle enhances Krondys’s arcane strength to even greater heights.
abilities.effect: Add 2 to casting rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: Liberators
warscrolls.fluff: The Liberators are the backbone of the God-King’s battlelines, trained to both enact sudden assaults and form unbreakable shieldwalls. To them falls the duty of casting down the warlords of ruin and stamping Sigmar’s claim upon the lands once more.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Stalwart Defenders
abilities.lore: Liberators fiercely guard the lands brought into Sigmar’s domain.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to this unit’s control score while it is contesting an objective wholly within friendly territory.

warscrolls.name: Lorai, Child of the Abyss
warscrolls.fluff: The elegant Soulscryer known as Lorai has accompanied the Blacktalons for as long as they can remember. As an Idoneth of the deepest seas, she is pallid, constantly cold and somehow seems young and old at the same time. Her ageless looks conceal her long lifespan spent in service to her enclave, of which none save Hendrick is truly aware.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Ward (5+), Order, Idoneth Deepkin, The Blacktalons

abilities.name: Nebulous Sea-fog
abilities.lore: A hazy mist coalesces into a thick, obscuring fog around Lorai.
abilities.declare: Make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, while a friendly **THE BLACKTALONS** unit is wholly within 6" of this unit, if the unmodified hit roll for a shooting attack that targets that unit is 1-5, the attack fails and the attack sequence ends.

abilities.name: Aquatic Illusions
abilities.lore: Lorai conjures liquid figures out of the ethersea that mystify and confuse nearby enemies.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Aquilor
warscrolls.fluff: The Lord-Aquilors are the leaders of the Vanguard Auxiliary chambers, hunters and warriors both who ride ahead of the Stormhosts to deliver an arrow-swift assault. Keen of eye and wit alike, they are capable of enacting blisteringly swift hit-and-run assaults thanks to the winds aetheric, magical currents that surge unseen across the realms.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber

abilities.name: Ride The Winds Aetheric
abilities.lore: Gryph-chargers can move faster than the eye can follow along the winds aetheric.
abilities.declare: If this unit is not in combat, you can pick up to 2 friendly **VANGUARD-PALLADORS** units that are not in combat to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Remove this unit and the targets (if any) from the battlefield. Set this unit up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, set up each target wholly within 12" of this unit and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Arcanum
warscrolls.fluff: Lord-Arcanums are masters of the Sacrosanct chambers. In battle, they unleash storms of celestial force or employ strange spirit-sorceries to rebind the souls of fallen comrades to their bodies, allowing them to fight on.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Magical Mending
abilities.lore: A Lord-Arcanum can reknit structures formed from magic with their incantations, allowing them to repair nearby arcane conjurations.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **MANIFESTATION** wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: **Heal (D6)** the target.

abilities.name: Aetheric Manipulation
abilities.lore: This wizard can manipulate the aetheric energies of the realms, channelling them into powerful spells to summon manifestations.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for this unit when it uses a **SUMMON** ability.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Arcanum on Celestial Dracoline
warscrolls.fluff: Lord-Arcanums who ride Dracolines favour bombastic, aggressive magics above all. They are often found hurling spears of scouring elemental force into the foe’s ranks while their bestial companion lopes forward to pounce.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Pack Alpha
abilities.lore: A Lord-Arcanum on Dracoline can urge their mount to issue a great roar to its loyal pack-mates, stoking their rage and ferocity to untold heights.
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat, pick this unit and up to 1 other visible friendly **SACROSANCT CHAMBER CAVALRY** unit within its combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the targets’ **Companion** melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Storm Wave
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: The Lord-Arcanum channels thunderous Azyrite force through allied cavalry just as they impact with the foe.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **SACROSANCT CHAMBER CAVALRY** unit that charged this phase and is wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on each enemy unit in combat with the target.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Arcanum on Gryph-charger
warscrolls.fluff: It is not easy for a Lord-Arcanum to earn a Gryph-charger’s respect. Those who succeed gain an impossibly fleet mount, ensuring their sorceries can be unleashed wherever they are most needed.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: On the Winds Aetheric
abilities.lore: Gryph-chargers can move faster than the eye can follow along the winds aetheric.
abilities.effect: If this unit is not in combat, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Healing Light
abilities.lore: A Lord-Arcanum gathers aetheric energy and uses it to revitalise the depleted life energies of nearby Sacrosanct warriors.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **SACROSANCT CHAMBER** unit that is not in combat and is within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: If the target is damaged, **Heal (D6)** the target. If the target is not damaged, return a slain model to it.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Arcanum on Tauralon
warscrolls.fluff: Lord-Arcanums who ride Tauralons are masters of the heavens. From their lofty vantage point, they unleash a hurricane of Azyrite magics, while those who fight in their wake are invigorated by the magical wake left by the great winged beast.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Wizard (1), Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Starlight Mantle
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: At a command from its rider, the Tauralon spreads its wings to shed celestial motes that settle upon nearby Stormcasts, providing them with a lingering mantle of protective force.
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat, pick each visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit within its combat range to be the targets.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, the targets have **WARD (5+)** and this unit has **STRIKE-LAST.**

abilities.name: Aetheric Deflection
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Enemy Hero Phase
abilities.lore: From their high perch, the Lord- Arcanum can locate enemy casters and turn the target’s spells back upon them.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **WIZARD** that used a **SPELL** ability this phase and is within 30" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll **X**+1 dice, where **X** is an amount equal to the target’s power level. For each 2+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Trails of Astral Light
abilities.lore: The aetheric glow that trails in a Tauralon’s wake guides the spells of nearby Stormcasts.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to casting rolls for friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS WIZARDS** while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Castellant
warscrolls.fluff: Masters of defensive warfare, the Lord-Castellants oversee the fortification of Sigmar’s empire. The mystical lanterns they carry are empowered by celestial energies, bolstering their wounded Stormcast brethren even as they hurl back the tainted foe.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Loyal Companion
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: A Lord-Castellant’s Gryph-hound will protect its master to the bitter end.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit has **WARD (4+)**. Remove this unit’s **Gryph-hound** from the battlefield at the end of the turn.

abilities.name: Warding Lantern
abilities.lore: Filled with holy energies, a warding lantern either imbues nearby Stormcast Eternals with power or burns their foes.
abilities.declare: Pick an objective within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units have **WARD (6+)** while they are contesting the target.
• Ward rolls cannot be made for enemy units while they are contesting the target.

abilities.name: Dutiful Gryph-hound
abilities.lore: Each Lord-Castellant is accompanied by a Gryph-hound trained to fight alongside them.
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Gryph-hound** is a token. If this unit’s **Gryph-hound** has been removed, it can no longer attack with its **Gryph-hound’s Beak** and it cannot use the ‘Loyal Companion’ ability.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Celestant
warscrolls.fluff: The Lord-Celestants are all cunning tacticians, ferocious fighters and formidably effective leaders. To the people of the realms, they are the avenging hand of the heavens walking amongst them; to their warriors, they are lieges who shoulder the unimaginable burden of choosing where their kin shall endure another death.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Furious Retribution
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Lord‑Celestants lead their brethren in assaults upon the enemy lines, breaking the foe beneath their immortal fury.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO WARRIOR CHAMBER INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Celestant on Dracoth
warscrolls.fluff: Some Lord-Celestants will undergo the Trials of Starwalking, a series of perilous tests that, if passed, earn them the right to ride a Dracoth mount as well as the creature’s respect. These storied commanders lead from the front atop their draconic steeds, and they are utterly devastating in combat.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Righteous Avengers
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Lord-Celestants inspire their brethren to mete out Sigmar’s justice; nearby Stormcasts strike the instant they are given the order.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO EXTREMIS CHAMBER CAVALRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Celestant on Stardrake
warscrolls.fluff: The partnership of Stormcast and Stardrake is a potent force indeed upon the battlefield, both beings committed to holding off the collapse of order and sanity. Even the greater daemons of Chaos must be wary around a Lord-Celestant and their draconic ally, for they can annihilate any foe in a barrage of lightning-charged blows and summoned meteors.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Battle Damaged
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its **Stardrake’s Cavernous Jaws** is 4.

abilities.name: Cavernous Jaws
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The enormous maw of a Stardrake can bite a foe in half.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll 3 dice. For each roll that equals or exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.

abilities.name: Lord of the Host
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Each Lord-Celestant is a renowned and respected leader – their very presence steels the souls of those under their command who fight nearby.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of other friendly **EXTREMIS CHAMBER** units wholly within 12" of this unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Commander Bastian Carthalos
warscrolls.fluff: Bastian Carthalos is Lord-Commander of the Hammers of Sigmar. As a mortal, he led his warriors in a daring assault against the Everchosen himself, buying time for the God-King to lead the retreat to Azyr. Sigmar looked upon Bastian’s valour with favour, calling on the ninth Great Bolt, Skjordamar, to Reforge his shattered form.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Ward (5+), Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Mantle of the First Storm
abilities.lore: Bastian’s armour is among the first of its kind, laboured over by Grungni himself and charged with the same holy energies as the Anvil of Apotheosis. It is a symbol of, and potent boon to, the Thunderborn’s already legendary willpower.
abilities.effect: If any enemy models were slain by this unit’s attacks this turn, **Heal (4)** this unit.

abilities.name: Castellan of Azyr
abilities.lore: Centuries spent commanding Sigmar’s prime Stormhost have sharpened Bastian’s tactical nous to a deadly edge. There are few warlords more adept than he in all the armies of Order.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS INFANTRY** units to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Each target can use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

abilities.name: Voice of Thunder
abilities.lore: Lord‑Commanders are among the few faithful who can commune with Sigmar in the heat of battle. Their words are like booming thunderclaps, each order ringing across the battlefield.
abilities.effect: Each time a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘All-out Attack’ command, no command points are spent.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Exorcist
warscrolls.fluff: The bane of the daemon and the gheist, the mystical Lord-Exorcists hold great power over the cleansing of soul-stuff. With their magics, they banish unclean  entities while saving the spirits of any who may prove redeemable.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Redemptor Casket
abilities.lore: Each redemption stave incorporates a casket for the containment of malicious spirits.
abilities.effect: Models cannot be returned to enemy units within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Purifying Blast
abilities.lore: Lord-Exorcists specialise in the dissolution of fell rituals, disrupting them with the scouring light of Azyr.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy **PRIEST** within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 2+:

• If the target has any ritual points, remove a number of ritual points from it equal to the roll.
• If the target has no ritual points, inflict D3 mortal damage on it.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Imperatant
warscrolls.fluff: While the other commanders claim authority over a singular chamber, the Lord-Imperatants are charged with marshalling the combined forces of the Stormhosts. To them, the chambers of the host are as shield and sword, each echelon and conclave a tool to be wielded as necessary.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Loyal Gryph-hound
abilities.lore: The Gryphhound that accompanies the Lord-Imperatant is the most faithful guard.
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Gryph-hound** is a token. This unit has **WARD (5+)** while its **Gryph-hound** is on the battlefield.

If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove its **Gryph-hound** from the battlefield after the **ATTACK** ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

abilities.name: Guided by Lightning
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: With the aid of their enchanted stormcaller baton, a Lord-Imperatant can direct the arrival of their brethren with the utmost precision.
abilities.declare: Pick up to 3 friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units wholly within 12" of this unit that were set up this turn using the ‘Scions of the Storm’ ability to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Each target can immediately move D3". The targets cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Ordinator
warscrolls.fluff: Proficient in arcane engineering and the reading of portents, the Lord-Ordinators are a potent force. Such traits make them excellent artillery commanders, and they expertly direct the war machinery of their allies to annihilate their foes.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Arcane Engineer
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Shooting Phase
abilities.lore: A Lord-Ordinator is a scryer of possibilities. Those under their command gain insights into the movements of the enemy.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **SACROSANCT CHAMBER WAR MACHINE** wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target’s attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 4+ for the rest of the phase.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Relictor
warscrolls.fluff: The high priests of the God-King’s legions, Lord‑Relictors call upon the fulminating energies of Azyr to annihilate the foe or energise their flagging brethren. As battle rages, these grim champions ward the souls of their kin and use their strange powers to guide them safely back to the Realm of Heavens.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Mortis Priest
abilities.lore: Though all mortals chosen by the God-King demonstrate their martial strength, those selected to become Lord-Relictors possess a rare wisdom that sets them apart.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to chanting rolls for this unit.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Terminos
warscrolls.fluff: A Lord-Terminos's axe culls their enemies in great measure, but so too does it take the heads of fellow Stormcasts. These grim figures do not seek out the afflicted like merciless angels of death, however: these damaged souls come forth willingly, knowing that their time in the Mortal Realms has come to its inevitable end.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Memorian
abilities.lore: Memorians serve to remind soul-damaged Stormcasts of their humanity.
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Memorian** is a token. Add 3 to the control scores of friendly **RUINATION CHAMBER** units wholly within 12" of this unit while its **Memorian** is on the battlefield.

If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove its **Memorian** from the battlefield after the **ATTACK** ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Earn an Honourable Death
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: The Lord-Terminos accompanies their Ruination chamber, the Stormcasts seeking to earn their final rest by proving themselves one last time in battle.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO RUINATION CHAMBER INFANTRY** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Veritant
warscrolls.fluff: The Lord-Veritants are chosen from those whose hatred of Chaos eclipses all else. They have the uncanny ability to detect the merest sliver of corruption: a skill that has seen many reassigned to the Ruination chambers, where their assistance in monitoring warriors after exposure to the most hellish environment has proved invaluable.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Priest (1), Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Staff of Abjuration
abilities.lore: The blessed light that shines from this staff can banish even the most potent sorceries.
abilities.effect: This unit can use **UNBIND** abilities as if it had **WIZARD (1)**.

abilities.name: Sense Unholy Sorcery
abilities.lore: Gryph‑crows are sensitive to corruption and immediately alert their masters whenever unholy energies are nearby.
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Gryph-crow** is a token. Subtract 1 from casting rolls and chanting rolls for enemy units within 12" of this unit while its **Gryph-crow** is on the battlefield.

If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove its **Gryph-crow** from the battlefield after the **ATTACK** ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

warscrolls.name: Lord-Vigilant on Gryph-Stalker
warscrolls.fluff: The Lord-Vigilants are the commanders and wardens of the Ruination chambers, who sequester their soul-stricken warriors away until the hour of the direst need. Much like their kin, their sense of self has begun to decay, but grim means allow them to maintain enough lucidity to command their brethren in battle.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Deliver Judgement
