abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: The Lord-Vigilant orders their soul-hollowed brethren to deliver Sigmar's wrath unto their enemies.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO RUINATION CHAMBER** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. After the first is used, however, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Lord-Vigilant on Morrgryph
warscrolls.fluff: A rare few Lord-Vigilants earn the trust and companionship of a Morrgryph, a creature sacred to the Bleak Raven. Their riders usually wield a long-hafted glaive for the reach it provides from their high saddle and its devastating power on the charge.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Hero, Monster, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Direct The Assault
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Surveying the battlefield, the Lord-Vigilant perceives a weak point in the enemy lines and orders their brethren to follow them into the breach.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**HERO RUINATION CHAMBER** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, while the target is wholly within 12" of this unit, add 5 to the target's control score.

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Vice-Like Grip
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase
abilities.lore: The Morrgryph pounces on an enemy leader, pinning them in the grip of its talons.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy non-**MONSTER HERO** in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Roll 2D6. If the result exceeds the target's Health characteristic, for the rest of the turn:

• The target has **STRIKE-LAST**.
• The target cannot use commands.

warscrolls.name: Neave Blacktalon
warscrolls.fluff: Neave Blacktalon is Sigmar’s foremost assassin. With the winds aetheric swirling at her feet, she can move with such speed that she appears to have teleported, sinking her axes into an enemy’s neck and darting away before they can react. Having beaten back the forces of Nurgle time and time again, Neave’s accolades across Aqshy and Ghyran have seen her ascend into legend.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber, The Blacktalons

abilities.name: Windrider
abilities.lore: Neave Blacktalon has a natural talent at translocating in a blur of lightning to ride the winds aetheric.
abilities.declare: If this unit is in combat or charged this turn, this unit can make a pile-in move. Then, if this unit is in combat, you must pick 1 or more enemy units to be the target(s) of this unit’s attacks.
abilities.effect: Resolve combat attacks against the target unit(s). Then, roll a dice. On a 3+, remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 3" from all enemy units and wholly within the combat range of a friendly **THE BLACKTALONS** unit that is not in combat.

abilities.name: Justice From Azyr
abilities.lore: When the chance to eliminate her mark presents itself, Neave is merciless in bringing them to justice.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Whirlwind Axes** for attacks that target a **HERO**.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **SHOOT** and/ or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Neave's Companions
warscrolls.fluff: The first iteration of the Blacktalons was formed decades ago by Sigmar for the purpose of slaying an ancient god, though it eventually disbanded and passed into secrecy. Now it has been resurrected with Neave at its helm, with the intention that they will one day slay beings of a more ruinous kind.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, The Blacktalons

abilities.name: Shield of Azyr
abilities.lore: These golden armoured warriors will willingly put themselves in mortal danger in order to protect Neave and Lorai.
abilities.effect: While any friendly **THE BLACKTALONS HEROES** are wholly within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Praetors
warscrolls.fluff: The Praetors are the bodyguards of the Stormcast Eternals’ commanders. Their souls are practically entwined with those of their designated ward, allowing them to absorb their master’s wounds into their own flesh through mere physical contact, selflessly enduring while their lord fights on.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Soul-forged Guardians
abilities.lore: Praetors will protect their soul-bonded charges with every ounce of their being.
abilities.effect: While this unit’s soul-bonded charge is within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and that soul-bonded charge have **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Soul-bonded
abilities.lore: Praetors are exemplary bodyguards, linked to their assigned wards at an arcane, spiritual level.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS HERO** to be this unit’s soul-bonded charge for the rest of the battle. This unit can use this ability while it is in reserve.

warscrolls.name: Prosecutors
warscrolls.fluff: Many legends sing of the shining angels known as Prosecutors. However, long gone are the radiant winged heralds of yore. As the clouds churn with Chaos corruption, ever more Prosecutors have found their sense of self eroding, necessitating their reassignment to the Ruination chambers.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Heralds of Righteousness
abilities.lore: Prosecutors cross the battlefield in a blur of light.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.lore: These warriors maintain a wide formation, enabling more precise strikes and greater battlefield control.
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Protectors
warscrolls.fluff: As a Protector retinue advances, they spin their stormstrike glaives in intricate arcs. By doing so, they create shields of celestial force, safeguarding  their comrades while the Paladins eagerly put their warrior skills to work.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Shield of the Storm
abilities.lore: Attacks are deflected by the Protectors’ weaving glaives.
abilities.effect: While any friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS INFANTRY HEROES** are within this unit’s combat range, both this unit and those friendly units have **WARD (5+)**.

warscrolls.name: Questor Soulsworn
warscrolls.fluff: Stormcast Questors are typically solitary figures, carrying the burden of their divine missions alone, yet there are those labours so vital or challenging that even a Stormcast may not be able to complete them by themselves. In these instances, they are forged into gatherings of might known as Questor Soulsworn.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: His Will Be Done
abilities.lore: Questors will stop at nothing to fulfil the sacred task given to them by the God-King himself.
abilities.effect:
While this unit is contesting a questmarked objective:

• Add 3 to this unit’s control score.
• This unit has **WARD (5+)**.

abilities.name: Relictor Soulguide
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
abilities.lore: The Knight-Relictor who accompanies the Soulsworn uses the winds of Sigmar’s Tempest to translocate the Questors to where they are most needed.
abilities.declare: You can pick a friendly **Knight‑Questor** within this unit’s combat range to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units. Then, if you picked a target, remove it from the battlefield and set it up again within this unit’s combat range and more than 9" from all enemy units.

abilities.name: Ordained Quest
abilities.lore: Questors travel deep into enemy territory to gain control of vital landmarks with hidden secrets.
abilities.effect: Pick an objective wholly outside friendly territory. That objective is considered by you to be questmarked.

warscrolls.name: Reclusians
warscrolls.fluff: The Reclusians are warriors of the Ruination chambers, their identities eroded by countless Reforgings over centuries in service to God-King. Though they are close to becoming more engine of war than human, their lightning-scoured souls are particularly resistant to Chaos as a result, allowing them to tread where no other servant of Sigmar could hope to survive.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Memorian Descendants
abilities.lore: Reclusians are accompanied by Memorians who serve to remind them of their humanity.
abilities.effect:
This unit’s **Memorians** are tokens. There are 2 **Memorians** for every 3 models in this unit. While any of this unit’s **Memorians** are on the battlefield, add 1 to this unit’s resistance rolls when using the ‘Ruination Chamber’ ability.

Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove 1 of its **Memorians** from the battlefield after the **ATTACK** ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

warscrolls.name: Retributors
warscrolls.fluff: A Retributor retinue wields crushing lightning hammers, amongst the most unsubtle and devastating weaponry in the Stormhosts’ arsenal. By channelling the storm’s fury through these fearsome weapons, the Retributors strike the foe with annihilating force.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Crushing Counter-blow
abilities.lore: Retributors are experts in close combat. Once an enemy has made the fatal mistake of engaging them, they will be shattered by the Paladins’ answering blows.
abilities.effect: If this unit is damaged or if any models in this unit were slain this turn, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Scourge of Ghyran Iridan the Witness
warscrolls.fluff: The heart and soul of the Ruination chambers is Iridan the Witness, chosen champion of the mysterious death god Morrda. Dispatched to the battlefields of the Everspring Swathe, they lead a great detachment of silent, storm-eyed champions. Iridan rides the Morrgryph Ariax, a winged menace whose unearthly presence on the battlefield fills the enemies of Order with a bone-deep terror and robs them of their will to fight.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Monster, Priest (1), Fly, Ward (6+), Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Guardian of the Final Threshold
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: This unit was picked to be the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.lore: Iridan does battle where others cannot tread, fighting in lands transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on this shepherd of lost souls, their faith granting them near immunity to such impurities.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 3+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Demands of the Witness
abilities.lore: Iridan understands better than any that the most assured way to avoid the incremental erosion of the flaw in the Reforging process is to avoid being cut down, and so they exhort their charges to vanquish their foes quickly, mercilessly and without hesitation.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly **RUINATION CHAMBER** unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the Rend characteristic of the target’s melee weapons. If the chanting roll was 7+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

abilities.name: On Wings of Death
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: Ariax swoops over the heads of the foe, wrong-footing charging enemies.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect:
Effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+:

• You can remove this unit from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield within 1" of the target.

• If the target charged this turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: The Flames of Hope
abilities.lore: The billowing flames borne by Iridan are instantly recognisable by all of Sigmar’s greatest warriors, even those who have lost nearly every part of themselves in his name.
abilities.effect: You can re-roll resistance rolls for friendly **RUINATION CHAMBER** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.name: Sequitors
warscrolls.fluff: Arcane mystery clings to the Sequitors, footsoldiers of the Sacrosanct chambers. By channelling celestial power through their wargear, they can bolster their strength to new heights, all the while carrying out the secretive missions of their hosts.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Sequitor Aetheric Channelling
abilities.lore: Sequitors can use their knowledge of the arcane arts to channel aetheric energy into their weapons or shields.
abilities.effect:
If this unit is contesting an objective you control, pick 1 of the following effects to apply for the rest of the turn:

• Other than the **Companion** weapon ability, weapon abilities for attacks that target this unit have no effect.
• This unit’s combat attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

warscrolls.name: Steelheart’s Champions
warscrolls.fluff: The Liberator retinue known as Steelheart’s Champions embodies the resolute heroism of the Hammer of Sigmar. They have earned countless battle honours, and few foes cannot be overcome by the strength of their fellowship.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Stalwart Defenders
abilities.lore: Liberators fiercely guard the lands brought into Sigmar’s domain.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to this unit’s control score while it is contesting an objective wholly within friendly territory.

abilities.name: Heroic Guard
abilities.lore: Steelheart’s Champions stand impervious and unyielding in the face of the enemy.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to save rolls for this unit while it is in combat with any enemy units that charged in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Stormcoven
warscrolls.fluff: Stormcovens are elite strike teams of arcane specialists who often find themselves operating as part of a larger Stormcast army. Each of a Stormcoven’s Knight-Arcanums has mastered a particular school of celestial sorcery, and when they combine their talents, the effects are truly devastating.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Wizard (1), Infantry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Aethershock
abilities.lore: The Stormcoven unleash their stored energies across the battlefield, bolstering their allies or blasting enemies to the ground.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible unit within 12" of the caster to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
abilities.effect: If the target is a friendly unit, it has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn. If the target is an enemy unit, it has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Gather the Aether
abilities.lore: A Stormcoven can harness the aetheric energies from the ley lines that criss-cross the Mortal Realms, ready to be unleashed at a moment’s notice.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to this unit’s power level while it is contesting an objective.

warscrolls.name: Stormdrake Guard
warscrolls.fluff: The Stormdrake Guard are the result of the alliance between Azyr and the Draconith. In battle, they are holy terrors, the Stormcasts fighting with consummate skill while the drakes' burning breath and vicious claws annihilate their foes.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Champion, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Draconic Onslaught
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: To reclaim their old empire, the Draconith and their riders fight together as a single furious whole, savaging any who cross their path.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can end that move in combat. Then, pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across during that move. Inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.lore: These warriors maintain a wide formation, enabling more precise strikes and greater battlefield control.
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Stormdrake Guard (1 model)
warscrolls.fluff: The Stormdrake Guard are the result of the alliance between Azyr and the Draconith. In battle, they are holy terrors, the Stormcasts fighting with consummate skill while the drakes' burning breath and vicious claws annihilate their foes.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Monster, Champion, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Extremis Chamber

abilities.name: Extremis Chamber
abilities.lore: Most scarce of Sigmar’s forces are the Extremis chambers, with each Stormcast mounted on a living weapon. To draw near these warriors is to risk being scoured by lightning or flame.
abilities.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the **FIGHT** ability has been resolved.

abilities.name: Draconic Onslaught
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
abilities.lore: To reclaim their old empire, the Draconith and their riders fight together as a single furious whole, savaging any who cross their path.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can end that move in combat. Then, pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across during that move. Inflict D3 mortal damage on that enemy unit.

abilities.name: Dispersed Formation
abilities.lore: These warriors maintain a wide formation, enabling more precise strikes and greater battlefield control.
abilities.effect: This unit has a coherency range of 2".

warscrolls.name: Stormreach Portal
warscrolls.fluff: A masterful example of Azyrite engineering, the Stormreach Portal adapts the mystical powers of the Star Bridges for use in the field. Stormcasts that enter its swirling interior can be instantly redeployed via lightning strike to an area within the Portal's vicinity, as if dispatched from Sigmaron itself.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Faction Terrain, Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Step Into The Storm
abilities.lore: Stormreach Portals are used in battle to redirect the warriors of the Stormcast Eternals to where the fighting is fiercest.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly non-**MONSTER STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that is not in combat and is wholly within 6" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

warscrolls.name: Stormsire's Cursebreakers
warscrolls.fluff: A specialist in the sundering of dark enchantments, Knight-Incantor Stormsire is also acutely aware of the negative toll Reforging takes on a Stormcast’s soul, relentlessly searching for any form of cure in even the most hostile of locations. The Evocators Ammis and Rastus have journeyed into many an unhallowed corner of the realms alongside their master and friend Averon Stormsire, wielding the crackling storm-magics of Azyr with a ferocious skill.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Sacrosanct Chamber

abilities.name: Overwhelming Storm
abilities.lore: Few can stand before the unleashed power of the Sacrosanct chambers.
abilities.declare: If this unit is contesting an objective that you control, pick a friendly non-**HERO STORMCAST ETERNALS INFANTRY** unit within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the phase, add 1 to wound rolls for the target’s combat attacks.

abilities.name: Averon Stormsire
abilities.lore: Averon can summon forth a storm of celestial lightning of unmatchable ferocity.
abilities.effect: While this unit’s **Averon Stormsire** is on the battlefield, it has **WIZARD (1)**.

warscrolls.name: Stormstrike Chariot
warscrolls.fluff: Swift war-carriages of the Angelos conclaves, Stormstrike Chariots are potent linebreakers. As they build up speed, they draw the energies of Azyr to themselves before unleashing them in thunderous blasts amidst the enemy ranks.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: War Machine, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Azyr Unleashed
abilities.lore: The impact of a Stormstrike Chariot on the charge can obliterate even the most durable of shieldwalls.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.

abilities.name: Celestial Blaze
abilities.lore: The Stormstrike Chariot smashes through lesser foes in a blaze of celestial power.
abilities.effect: When this unit uses the ‘Power Through’ command, inflict an additional D3 mortal damage on the target and add D6" to the distance this unit can move as part of that ability.

warscrolls.name: Stormstrike Palladors
warscrolls.fluff: The hard-hitting cavalry of the Warrior chambers, Stormstrike Palladors are outfitted not solely to administer a devastating charge but also to engage in extended periods of melee fighting in which their heavy blades and the talons of their Gryph-chargers prove most effective killing tools.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Musician (1/3),  Standard Bearer (1/3), Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Ride for Vengeance
abilities.lore: As Stormcast casualties increase and the battle seems poised upon a knife’s edge, an armoured wedge of Stormstrike Palladors crashes into the enemy lines. Driven by a desire to avenge their fallen brethren, these warriors and their avian mounts unleash the fury of the storm on the God-King’s foes.
abilities.effect:
If any friendly **WARRIOR CHAMBER** units have been destroyed this battle:

• You can re-roll charge rolls for this unit.
• This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** if it charged in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: The Emberwatch
warscrolls.fluff: The Emberwatch stalk the smoky darkness beneath Embergard, ensuring that its precious seams of realmstone do not fall into the wrong hands – be it avaricious Skaven, or ill-advised Sigmarites. Ardorn Flamerunner leads this band of Stormcast rangers, though his brash temperament often clashes with the cold and watchful knife-fighter, Farasa Twice-Risen. Yurik Velzaine styles himself as both the mediator and sharpshooter of the group, enchanted crossbow ever close to hand.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber

abilities.name: Merciless Sentinels
abilities.lore: The Emberwatch have stalked the mines of Embergard so long that they have become tenacious and unforgiving in pursuit of their mission.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s attacks while it contests an objective that is wholly outside friendly territory.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chambers are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: The Farstriders
warscrolls.fluff: Sanson Farstrider is one of the most experienced Hunter-Primes in the Hammers of Sigmar. He and his band of veteran rangers specialise in undertaking the most critical and death-defying of missions behind enemy lines.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber

abilities.name: Star Falcon
abilities.lore: Farstrider’s loyal companion can swoop from the skies to strike the enemy.
abilities.declare: If this unit’s **Sanson Farstrider** is on the battlefield, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Tornus the Redeemed
warscrolls.fluff: Tornus the Redeemed is living proof that even the most tainted souls are not beyond salvation. A former devotee of the Plague God, he now serves Sigmar with an unshakeable faith. Reforged as a Knight-Azyros, he has dedicated himself to providing some degree of succour to the troubled warriors of the Ruination chambers.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Infantry, Fly, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Ruination Chamber

abilities.name: Ruination Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Reaction: This unit was picked as the target of a non-CORE ability
abilities.lore: These veterans march where others cannot tread, fighting upon battlefields transformed into scenes of apocalypse. Even the most corrosive magics find no purchase on their souls.
abilities.effect: Make a resistance roll of D6. On a 4+, that ability has no effect on this unit.

abilities.name: Herald of Redemption
abilities.lore: In Tornus, the troubled warriors of the Ruination chambers see a kindred spirit and heed his rallying call in battle.
abilities.effect: If a friendly **RUINATION CHAMBER** unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you receive 3 additional rally points.

abilities.name: The Light of Sigmar
abilities.lore: With its shutters closed, the lantern of a Knight-Azyros soothes nearby allies. Opening it wide blinds the enemy with the full majesty of Sigmar’s light.
abilities.effect:
Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the following effects:

• For the rest of the turn, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by enemy units while they are in combat with this unit.
• **Heal (D3)** each friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit within this unit’s combat range.

warscrolls.name: Vandus Hammerhand
warscrolls.fluff: To Vandus’s warriors, he is still the same golden demigod as he was at the dawn of the Age of Sigmar. However, it is within this immortal shell that Vandus’s maddened soul is trapped, haunted by endless visions. As countless Reforgings slowly erode the last of his personhood, he dwells in his Stormhost’s Bleak Citadel between battles, watched closely by the Ruination chamber’s wardens.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Hero, Cavalry, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Lord of the Hammerhands
abilities.lore: Vandus is a mighty champion of the Hammers of Sigmar and a consummate commander.
abilities.effect: Add 3 to the control scores of friendly **WARRIOR CHAMBER** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: Vengeance Unleashed
abilities.phaseDetails: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit
abilities.lore: Vandus inspires nearby members of the Warrior chambers to strike forth and deliver justice in the God-King’s name.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly non-**HERO WARRIOR CHAMBER** unit that has not used a **FIGHT** ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a **FIGHT** ability immediately after the **FIGHT** ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to hit rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Vanguard-Hunters
warscrolls.fluff: Vanguard-Hunters are well suited for lifetimes spent in the wilds. Their short handaxes and weighted blades are as ideal for hacking through dense foliage as they are for carving apart flesh, while compact boltstorm pistols allow the Stormcasts to assail their prey even as they close in on them.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber

abilities.name: Astral Compass
abilities.lore: The Vanguard-Hunters use their astral compass to track their enemies across the Mortal Realms.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: The target has the **HUNTED** keyword for the rest of the battle.

abilities.name: Star-marked
abilities.lore: Those tracked by the Vanguard-Hunters can be sensed from great distances.
abilities.effect: Add 2" to this unit’s Move characteristic while a **HUNTED** enemy unit is on the battlefield. In addition, add 1 to hit rolls for this unit’s attacks that target a **HUNTED** enemy unit.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Vanguard-Palladors with Shock Handaxes
warscrolls.fluff: The Vanguard-Palladors are the Stormcast Eternals' elite skirmish cavalry, able to ride the winds aetheric to strike with great swiftness and accuracy. Those among their number who wield the shock handaxe over the starstrike javelin are better equipped for sustained engagements and sudden charges designed to scatter isolated formations.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber, Vanguard-Palladors

abilities.name: Shocking Strikes
abilities.lore: Enemies struck with shock handaxes reel in pain as electricity courses through their veins.
abilities.effect: If any damage points are allocated to an enemy unit by attacks made with this unit’s **Shock Handaxes**, subtract 1 from wound rolls for that enemy unit’s combat attacks for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Vanguard-Palladors with Starstrike Javelins
warscrolls.fluff: In addition to a boltstorm pistol, some Vanguard-Palladors are equipped with starstrike javelins, weapons that can not only be used in close combat but can also be hurled an impressive distance. Palladors so armed are highly flexible in battle, able to harry a foe's flank from afar or focus fire on enemy leaders caught out of position.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Cavalry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber, Vanguard-Palladors

abilities.name: Charging Volley
abilities.lore: Vanguard-Palladors unleash a deadly volley of missiles as they charge into their foes.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
abilities.effect: This unit can immediately use a **SHOOT** ability as if it were your shooting phase, but all of its attacks must target that enemy unit. In addition, unit's **Starstrike Javelins** have **Shoot in Combat** this phase.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Vanguard-Raptors with Hurricane Crossbows
warscrolls.fluff: Vanguard-Raptors are natural hunters, often scouting ahead of the main battle line to harry the enemy with deadly crossbow fire. Those who favour the close-ranged kill form into retinues armed with hurricane crossbows, ferocious weapons capable of stalling the most determined enemy advance with blistering quick-fire volleys.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber

abilities.name: Coordinated Strike
abilities.lore: The warriors of the Vanguard chamber train relentlessly to fight in perfect unison.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit that had any damage points allocated to it this turn by attacks made with this unit's **Hurricane Crossbows** to be the target.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **VANGUARD CHAMBER** units that target that enemy unit for the rest of the turn.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Vanguard-Raptors with Longstrike Crossbows
warscrolls.fluff: Raining death upon the enemy from afar, Vanguard-Raptors armed with longstrike crossbows are marksmen with few equals. They often seek to eliminate enemy leaders and champions, spreading panic and disorder through the foe's ranks with carefully chosen kills.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Vanguard Chamber

abilities.name: Headshot
abilities.lore: When given time to take careful aim, a Vanguard-Raptor can find their mark even amidst the roiling mass of battle.
abilities.effect: If this unit has not used a **MOVE** ability this turn and was not set up this turn, for the rest of the turn, this unit can ignore the effects of the ‘Guarded Hero’ ability (Core Rules, 25.0) when picking targets for its shooting attacks.

abilities.name: Vanguard Chamber
abilities.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
abilities.lore: Through swiftness, guile and more than a hint of savagery, the warriors of the Vanguard chamber are able to outfight forces many times their own limited numbers.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, this unit can use **SHOOT** and/or **CHARGE** abilities even if it used a **RUN** or **RETREAT** ability in the same turn.

warscrolls.name: Vanquishers
warscrolls.fluff: Vanquishers are greatsword-wielding infantry who specialise in carving through formations of numerous foes. The blade of each warrior is inset with a fragment of celestium, over which they will meditate before battle until their spirit is one with that of the sword. So attuned, these Stormcasts use the fragmentary visions provided by the realmstone shard to guide their strikes.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Musician (1/5), Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Lightning Strikes
abilities.lore: Vanquishers utilise a stance that allows them to make a flurry of rapid strikes against a numerous foe.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Celestial Greatswords** for attacks that target an enemy unit that has 5 or more models.

warscrolls.name: Vigilors
warscrolls.fluff: Clad in thunderstrike armour, Vigilors are skilled archers who fearlessly scout out a path for their brethren. Their arrows conjure brief flashes of lightning upon impact, sending coded signals to their kin and giving away the enemy’s position
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Navigators of the Storm
abilities.lore: As the Vigilors move swiftly beneath dark thunderclouds, the Grungni-forged arrowheads of their stormcaller bows give off flickers of lightning that reveal the location of their targets.
abilities.effect: If an enemy unit had any damage points allocated to it this turn by this unit’s shooting attacks, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units that target that unit for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Vindictors
warscrolls.fluff: Vindictors were amongst the first Stormcasts to be equipped with thunderstrike armour, their wargear designed by Grungni to defend against even the most aggressive enemy assaults. They are the shieldwall upon which the forces of ruin shatter. Forged from the most unrelenting souls, Vindictors will endure come what may and spit defiance until the last.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Infantry, Champion, Standard Bearer (1/5), Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Hold the Shieldwall
abilities.lore: The Vindictor retinues form the unyielding shieldwalls upon which the forces of ruin shatter.
abilities.effect: If this unit did not charge this turn and is in combat with an enemy unit that charged this turn, roll a dice. On a 4+, this unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

warscrolls.name: Xandire's Truthseekers
warscrolls.fluff: Armed with the Lantern Astrala, Calthia Xandire leads her fellows in search of Harrowdeep’s forgotten secrets. With her comes Dhoraz Giant-fell, who revels in each destructive swing of his hammer; Luxa Stormrider, who lets her proficiency with the bow speak for her; and Luxa’s aetherwing companion, Taros.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Unique, Infantry, Champion, Order, Stormcast Eternals, Warrior Chamber

abilities.name: Harrying Aetherwing
abilities.lore: Guided by Luxa Stormrider’s rune-etched arrows, Taros flies across the battlefield, harrying the enemy.
abilities.declare: If any attacks made with this unit’s **Stormcaller Bow** scored a critical hit this phase, pick an enemy unit targeted by those attacks to be the target.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, place **Taros** next to the target. While **Taros** is placed next to an enemy unit, that enemy unit cannot use commands.

abilities.name: Taros
abilities.lore: In battle, Luxa Stormrider is aided by her aetherwing companion, Taros, who harries the enemy.
abilities.effect: This unit’s **Taros** is a token. After setting up this unit on the battlefield for the first time, place **Taros** next to it.

warscrolls.name: Yndrasta, the Celestial Spear
warscrolls.fluff: With the resplendent white pinions granted unto her, no beast is beyond Yndrasta’s reach. Her spear, Thengavar, relentlessly seeks out its prey when thrown. There are those in the courts of Azyr who observe the cold satisfaction Yndrasta takes in slaughter and whisper that lifetimes of battle have hollowed out her soul.
warscrolls.referenceKeywords: Warmaster, Unique, Hero, Infantry, Fly, Ward (5+), Order, Stormcast Eternals

abilities.name: Dazzling Radiance
abilities.lore: Yndrasta’s god-touched brilliance casts a protective aura of light around nearby Stormcasts.
abilities.effect: Ignore negative modifiers to the control scores of friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

abilities.name: On Wings of Brilliance
abilities.lore: Yndrasta soars across the battlefield to strike at the heart of Sigmar’s enemies.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: The Prime Huntress
abilities.lore: Celestial strength, lifetimes of experience and the power of the spear Thengavar see even the most behemothic of terrors swiftly fall before Yndrasta’s fury.
abilities.effect: Double the Damage characteristic of this unit’s **Thengavar** for attacks that target **MONSTERS**.

rules.name: Ancient Aura
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase
rules.lore: Storm-charged energy ebbs and flows around the warriors of the Ruination chamber, surrounding them in a scouring aura of power. Finding purchase with a weapon on these ancient heroes can be a difficult task for even the mightiest of mortal foes.
rules.effect: That unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: Synchronised Strikes
rules.lore: The core of a Thunderhead Host is often made up of fighters from the Warrior chambers; having trained relentlessly with the sworn brethren of their Stormhost, they operate like a well-oiled cogfort.
rules.effect: Add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly **WARRIOR CHAMBER** units while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly non-**HERO** non-**BEAST STORMCAST ETERNALS** units that do not have the **WARRIOR CHAMBER** keyword.

rules.name: Oncoming Storm
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
rules.lore: First to the fight, the Lightning Echelon is akin to a spear-thrust into the heart of the enemy. Deployed only in times of great need, they smash into the foe’s vanguard with the force of an oncoming tempest.
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **EXTREMIS CHAMBER** unit that charged this turn.
rules.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, that unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

rules.name: Peerless Manoeuvres
rules.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
rules.lore: These warriors are the precision weapon of the God-King, skilled at manipulating a battlefield in their favour by feinting from view and reappearing where they are needed most.
rules.declare: Pick a friendly **VANGUARD CHAMBER** unit that did not use a **MOVE** ability this turn and is not in combat.
rules.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, remove that unit from the battlefield and set it up again anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

artefacts.name: Shield of Skjordamar
artefacts.lore: Said to have been forged with a sliver of the Great Bolt Skjordamar, this shield delivers a blast of celestial energy that can banish the corruption spread by malign magics.
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Roll a dice. On a 4+, ward rolls cannot be made for the target for the rest of the battle.

artefacts.name: Beacon of Azyr
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Hero Phase
artefacts.lore: This beacon is brimming with the magic of the Celestial Realm. When unleashed, holy lightning surges forth, empowering a nearby Stormcast Eternal who is attuned to the tempest.
artefacts.declare: Pick a visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS WIZARD** or **PRIEST** wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect:
The next time this turn that the target uses a **PRAYER** or **SPELL** ability, instead of making a casting roll or chanting roll for them, you can use a value of 7 for the roll that cannot be modified. After that ability is resolved, if the target has any ritual points, reset their ritual points total to 0.

**Designer’s Note:** *Ritual points apply modifiers so cannot be used with this ability to increase the chanting roll to more than 7.*

artefacts.name: Banner of Sigmar
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase
artefacts.lore: The hero unfurls a mighty banner and plunges its pommel into the earth with the force of a falling comet, where it stands upright and proud, declaring Sigmar’s reckoning to all who bear witness to its majesty.
artefacts.declare: Pick an objective within 18" of this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Until the start of your next turn, your opponent cannot control the target objective while they have no units contesting it.

artefacts.name: Sigil of Morrda
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn, Reaction: Opponent declared a command or a **RAMPAGE** ability for a unit in combat with this unit
artefacts.lore: This sigil is one of the god Morrda, a death god that escaped Nagash’s purge of Shyish. Their power, perhaps not what it once was, is still potent and to be rightly feared.
artefacts.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, that command or **RAMPAGE** ability has no effect, it still counts as having been used and any command points spent to use that ability are still lost.

artefacts.name: Null Pendant
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, End of Any Turn
artefacts.lore: This dark amulet holds magic within that can sap the resolve of the enemy.
artefacts.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
artefacts.effect: Subtract 5 from the target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

artefacts.name: Mirrorshield
artefacts.lore: This shield reflects the rays of Hysh in questing beams that seek out the eyes of enemy marksmen.
artefacts.effect: This unit cannot be targeted by shooting attacks unless the attacking model is within 9" of it.

artefacts.name: Quicksilver Draught
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Any Combat Phase
artefacts.lore: This potion lends uncanny speed to the one who imbibes it.
artefacts.effect: This unit has **STRIKE-FIRST** for the rest of the turn.

artefacts.name: Celestium Ensign
artefacts.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), End of Any Turn
artefacts.lore: The sight of this ancient heirloom spurs Draconith to draw upon hidden reserves of strength.
artefacts.effect: **Heal (3)** each friendly **DRACONITH SKYWING** unit wholly within 12" of this unit.

artefacts.name: Hallowed Scrolls
artefacts.lore: Parchments inscribed with Sigmarite blessings adorn this warrior's armour.
artefacts.effect: If this unit is **INFANTRY**, it has **WARD (5+)**. Otherwise, it has **WARD (6+)**.

heroicTraits.name: Thegn of Bellicos
heroicTraits.lore: In their mortal life, this warrior fought alongside Bastian at the Battle of Burning Skies and still does so after their Reforging.
heroicTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit's melee weapons while it is wholly within 6" of a friendly **Bastian** **Carthalos**.

heroicTraits.name: Staunch Defender
heroicTraits.lore: To contest the sacred grounds of Sigmar is to invoke the almighty power of Azyr.
heroicTraits.effect: While this unit is contesting an objective in friendly territory, add 3 to the control scores of friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units contesting that objective.

heroicTraits.name: Envoy of the Heavens
heroicTraits.lore: When a Stormcast Eternal is laid low, the light that carries the warrior’s soul back to Azyr invigorates those who fight on.
heroicTraits.declare: If a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit was destroyed in the previous turn, pick a visible friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit wholly within 12"of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: The target has **WARD (5+)** until the start of your next turn.

heroicTraits.name: Shock and Awe
heroicTraits.lore: When this warrior and their Stormcasts take to the field, their shining visages strike fear into the foe.
heroicTraits.effect:
Each time this unit is set up using the 'Scions of the Storm' ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target this unit for the rest of the battle round.

In addition, each time a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit is set up wholly within 12"of this unit using the 'Scions of the Storm' ability, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks that target that unit for the rest of the battle round.

heroicTraits.name: Legendary Tenacity
heroicTraits.lore: This hero might well be struck down, but there is little in the Mortal Realms that can stop them from rising again, bloodied but unbowed.
heroicTraits.effect: The first time this unit would be destroyed, before removing it from play, roll a dice. On a 3+, this unit is not destroyed and any remaining damage points inflicted on it have no effect. Then, **Heal (D3)** this unit.

heroicTraits.name: Intense Piety
heroicTraits.lore: This hero’s intense and unwavering devotion to the Sigmar’s mission is one of such absolute focus that they can cause the followers of rival gods to hesitate and falter with a few well-chosen words or soul-piercing stare.
heroicTraits.declare: Pick a visible enemy **PRIEST** or **WIZARD** within 18" of this unit to be the target.
heroicTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from casting rolls and chanting rolls for the target until the start of your next turn.

heroicTraits.name: Hour of Glory
heroicTraits.lore: This hero’s hour has come; their deeds will shatter the wicked, deliver the weak and protect the Mortal Realms themselves from any evil that would see them undone.
heroicTraits.effect: This unit can be picked to use the ‘Their Finest Hour’ ability even if it has already used it this battle. In addition, when this unit is picked to use the ‘Their Finest Hour’ ability, add 5 to its control score for the rest of the turn.

heroicTraits.name: Fearless Fliers
heroicTraits.lore: Such is the bond between this rider and their mount that they can perform the most graceful aerial manoeuvres in order to close the distance on their prey.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit is not in combat, it can immediately make a D6" move and can end that move in combat.

heroicTraits.name: Corven Lord
heroicTraits.lore: The souls of those who lead the Ruination chambers are anathema to malign influence.
heroicTraits.effect: If this unit has the 'Ruination Chamber', ability, it can use that ability once per turn regardless of whether another friendly unit has used it during the same turn.

other.name: Hunter's Cohesion
other.lore: The Horizon Seekers have long roamed the wilderness together, operating in well-honed unison to run circles around the foe.
other.effect:
Each time this Regiment of Renown's **Lord-Aquilor** uses its 'Ride the Winds Aetheric' ability, you can pick all units in this Regiment of Renown that are not in combat to be the targets.

In addition, add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made by this Regiment of Renown's **Lord-Aquilor** and **Vanguard-Palladors** units that target a **HUNTED** enemy unit.

**Designer's Note:** *See the 'Astral Compass' ability on the Vanguard-Hunters warscroll to see how an enemy unit can become* **HUNTED**.

other.name: Hour of Retribution
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Hero Phase
other.lore: Aldus Valnir and Ortana dive down from the clouds into the midst of the reelingfoe, using the shock of their sudden assault to inflict maximum damage.
other.effect:
For the rest of the turn:

• Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made by units in this Regiment of Renown.
• Add 1 to save rolls for units in this Regiment of Renown.

other.name: Justice Will Be Served
other.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle (Army), Any Combat Phase
other.lore: When her appointed target is within her grasp, Neave fights with the overwhelming fury of an Azyrite storm.
other.declare: Pick the **Neave Blacktalon** in this Regiment of Renown to be the target if it is in combat with an enemy **HERO**.
other.effect: The target can use 2 **FIGHT** abilities this phase. Each time it does so, if it is in combat with an enemy **HERO**, all of its attacks must target an enemy **HERO**. In addition, after the first **FIGHT** ability is used, the target has **STRIKE-LAST** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Summon the Storm
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: With a voice of booming thunder, Bastian can call forth his warriors, bringing them down in the heart of the enemy army.
battleTraits.declare: If a friendly **Bastian Carthalos** is on the battlefield and was not set up this turn, you can pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that is **in the Celestial Realm**.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit wholly within 6" of a friendly **Bastian** **Carthalos** and more than 3" from all enemy units. If the target is a unit of **Annihilators** or **Annihilators with Meteoric** **Grandhammers**, for the rest of the turn, the target counts as having used the 'Scions of the Storm' ability for the purposes of the 'Blazing Impact' ability.

battleTraits.name: Punch Through
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Charge Phase
battleTraits.lore: Like a plated fist, the warriors of the First-Forged drive deep into the enemy's ranks, smashing aside those in their path.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **INFANTRY** unit in combat that has not charged this turn to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: That unit can immediately use the 'Charge' ability and can move through enemy models when it does so.

battleTraits.name: Scions of the Storm
battleTraits.lore: Upon blessed bolts of lightning do the Stormcast Eternals ride to war, the furious rumble of thunder heralding their arrival.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that is **in the** **Celestial Realm**.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: The Celestial Realm
battleTraits.lore: In High Azyr, the Stormcast Eternals await their call to deliver retribution.
battleTraits.declare: If there are more friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units on the battlefield than there are set up in reserve, pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve **in the Celestial Realm**. It has now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Scions of the Storm
battleTraits.lore: Upon blessed bolts of lightning do the Stormcast Eternals ride to war, the furious rumble of thunder heralding their arrival.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that is **in the** **Celestial Realm**.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: Heavens-sent
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Battle, Your Movement Phase
battleTraits.lore: More reinforcements are sent down from Azyr in their fellow warriors’ time of need.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly non-**UNIQUE STORMCAST ETERNALS INFANTRY** or **CAVALRY** unit that started the battle with 2 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) more than 9" from all enemy units.

battleTraits.name: The Celestial Realm
battleTraits.lore: In High Azyr, the Stormcast Eternals await their call to deliver retribution.
battleTraits.declare: If there are more friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** units on the battlefield than there are set up in reserve, pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that has not been deployed.
battleTraits.effect: Set up that unit in reserve **in the Celestial Realm**. It has now been deployed.

battleTraits.name: Their Finest Hour
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Stormcast Eternals are bastions of hope for the forces of Order. In times of desperate need, each fighter does what is necessary to keep their enemies at bay.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **STORMCAST ETERNALS** unit that has not used this ability this battle to use this ability.
battleTraits.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to wound rolls for that unit’s combat attacks and add 1 to save rolls for that unit.

battleTraits.name: Thunderous Roar
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: A deafening roar is unleashed, drowning out the din of battle momentarily and melting the resolve of even the most stalwart foes.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **DRACONITH SKYWING MONSTER** that has not used any **RAMPAGE** abilities this turn to use this ability. Then, pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with it to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice for each target. On a 3+, subtract 5 from that target’s control score for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Aetheric Cyclone
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: The mighty Draconith whips its wings to create a ferocious squall that buffets the enemy lines, driving them to their knees.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **DRACONITH SKYWING MONSTER** that has not used any **RAMPAGE** abilities this turn to use this ability. Then, pick an enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, subtract 1 from wound rolls for the target’s attacks for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Shields of the Warden
battleTraits.lore: Ionus often goes into battle accompanied by an elite band of Stormdrake Guard whose sole duty is to protect their commander.
battleTraits.effect:
While any friendly **Stormdrake Guard** units are within a friendly **Ionus Cryptborn**’s combat range:

• That friendly **Ionus Cryptborn** has **WARD (4+)**.
• Each time you make a successful ward roll for that friendly **Ionus Cryptborn**, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly **Stormdrake Guard** unit within its combat range after the damage sequence for that friendly **Ionus Cryptborn** has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

battleTraits.name: Exemplars of Fury
battleTraits.lore: The leaders of the Skywings urge their scaled companions to strike with devastating force, their bloody assault an inspiration to all who witness it.
battleTraits.effect: Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of **Companion** weapons used by friendly **DRACONITH SKYWING HEROES** while they are within 6" of 2 or more friendly **Stormdrake Guard** units.

battleTraits.name: Ancient Aura
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army) Any Hero Phase
battleTraits.lore: Storm-charged energy ebbs and flows around the warriors of the Ruination chambers, surrounding them in a scouring aura of power. Finding purchase with a weapon on these ancient heroes can be a difficult task for even the mightiest of mortal foes.
battleTraits.effect: That unit has **WARD (5+)** for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Hallowed Presence
battleTraits.lore: While fighting alongside the Ruination chambers, those of the Warrior chambers are granted a measure of the incorruptible nature of their solemn brethren.
battleTraits.effect: While friendly **WARRIOR CHAMBER** units are wholly within 12" of any friendly **RUINATION CHAMBER** units, those friendly **WARRIOR CHAMBER** units have **WARD (6+)**.

battleTraits.name: Entropic Screech
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase
battleTraits.lore: Cocking its head back, the Morrgryph unleashes a soul-piercing screech that causes foes to wither and collapse under its necrotic onslaught.
battleTraits.declare: Pick a friendly **RUINATION CHAMBER MONSTER** that has not used any **RAMPAGE** abilities this turn to use this ability. Then, pick up to 3 enemy units in combat with it to be the targets.
battleTraits.effect: Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. The unit using this ability cannot use any more **RAMPAGE** abilities for the rest of the turn.

battleTraits.name: Temper the Flaw
battleTraits.phaseDetails: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn
battleTraits.lore: The warriors of the Ruination chambers must be shepherded by the mentors of the Bleak Citadels, else they risk losing what little remains of their soul.
battleTraits.declare: You must use this ability at the end of each turn. Each friendly non-**HERO RUINATION CHAMBER** unit that used a **FIGHT** ability this turn is a target.
battleTraits.effect:
For each target, pick 1 of the following effects:

• ***Guided:*** If the target is wholly within 12" of any friendly **RUINATION CHAMBER HEROES**, return 1 slain model to it.
• ***Tormented:*** If the target is not wholly within 12" of any friendly **RUINATIONS CHAMBER HEROES**, it becomes tormented until the end of the next turn. While a unit is tormented, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of its melee weapons but it cannot contest objectives or use commands.
